title: Evolution of Modern Architecture
headline: Learn about the evolution of design and modern architecture in this free online course.
description: The free online modern architecture course will introduce you to the history of design and architecture including many examples of architectural work. Start the course and learn about various architectural movements, the evolution of design and architecture across various timelines of modern architecture as well as the Bauhaus and De Stijl movements of modern architecture.
courseDescription:
In this free online course, you will be introduced to the history of design and architecture as well as various architectural works around the world. An introduction to the industrial revolution and the beginning of the modern era will also be covered extensively. Then, the course will look at various movements that rose up during the beginning of the industrial revolution like the "for the machine" movement and the "against the machine" movement.

The course will also teach you about various architectural movements that followed the design styles which agreed with or disapproved of the machine revolution. The evolution of design and architecture as well as the various timelines of modern architecture and design will be covered. Lastly, the course will look at two phases that occurred in modern architecture which are the Bauhaus movement and the De Stijl movement.

This course will be of interest to learners who would like to learn how architectural design has evolved over the years. Start this course today and learn about the evolution of design and architecture as well as some important phases of modern architecture.
